verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> assembled <WH6950> all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and <WH6950> said <WH559> unto them <WH1697>, These are the words which Jehovah <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680>, that ye should do them <WH6213>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> shall work <WH4399> be done <WH6213>; but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> there shall be to you a holy day <WH6944>, a sabbath <WH7676> of solemn rest <WH7677> to Jehovah <WH3068>: whosoever doeth <WH6213> any work <WH4399> therein shall be put to death <WH4191>.
Ye shall kindle <WH1197> no fire <WH784> throughout your habitations <WH4186> upon the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>.

And Moses <WH4872> spake <WH559> unto all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, This is the thing <WH1697> which Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH3947> ye from among you an offering <WH8641> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; whosoever <WH3605> is of a willing <WH5081> heart <WH3820>, let him bring <WH935> it <WH3068>, Jehovah's offering <WH8641>: gold <WH2091>, and silver <WH3701>, and brass <WH5178>,
and blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144>, and fine linen <WH8336>, and goats <WH5795>' hair,
and rams <WH352>' skins <WH5785> dyed red <WH119>, and <WH5785> sealskins <WH8476>, and acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086>,
and oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>, and spices <WH1314> for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and for the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>,
and onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68>, and stones <WH68> to be set <WH4394>, for the ephod <WH646>, and for the breastplate <WH2833>.
And let every <WH3820> wise-hearted <WH2450> man among you come <WH935>, and make <WH6213> all that Jehovah <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680>:
the tabernacle <WH4908>, its tent <WH168>, and its covering <WH4372>, its clasps <WH7165>, and its boards <WH7175>, its bars <WH1280>, its pillars <WH5982>, and its sockets <WH134>;
the ark <WH727>, and the staves <WH905> thereof <WH3727>, the mercy-seat, and the veil <WH6532> of the screen <WH4539>;
the table <WH7979>, and its staves <WH905>, and all its vessels <WH3627>, and the showbread <WH6440>;
the candlestick <WH4501> also for the light <WH3974>, and its vessels <WH3627>, and its lamps <WH5216>, and the oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>;

and the altar <WH4196> of incense <WH7004>, and its staves <WH905>, and the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>, and the screen <WH4539> for the door <WH6607>, at the door of the tabernacle <WH4908>;
the altar <WH4196> of burnt-offering <WH5930>, with its grating <WH4345> of brass <WH5178>, it staves <WH905>, and all its vessels <WH3627>, the laver <WH3595> and its base <WH3653>;
the hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691>, the pillars <WH5982> thereof <WH134>, and their sockets, and the screen <WH4539> for the gate <WH8179> of the court <WH2691>;
the pins <WH3489> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the pins <WH3489> of the court <WH2691>, and their cords <WH4340>;

the finely wrought garments <WH899>, for ministering <WH8278> in the holy <WH6944> place <WH6944>, the holy garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, and the garments <WH899> of his sons <WH1121>, to minister in the priest <WH3547>'s office.
And all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> departed <WH3318> from the presence <WH6440> of Moses <WH4872>.

And they came <WH935>, every one <WH376> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> stirred him up <WH5375>, and every one whom his spirit <WH7307> made willing <WH5068>, and brought <WH935> Jehovah <WH3068>'s offering <WH8641>, for the work <WH4399> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, and for all the service <WH5656> thereof <WH6944>, and for the holy garments <WH899>.

And they came <WH935>, both <WH5921> men <WH582> and women <WH802>, as many as <WH3605> were <WH5081> willing-hearted <WH3820>, and brought <WH935> brooches <WH2397>, and ear-rings <WH5141>, and signet-rings <WH2885>, and armlets <WH3558>, all jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>; even every man <WH376> that offered <WH5130> an offering <WH8573> of gold <WH2091> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And every man <WH376>, with whom was found <WH4672> blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144>, and fine linen <WH8336>, and goats <WH5795>' hair <WH352>, and rams' skins <WH5785> dyed red <WH119>, and <WH5785> sealskins <WH8476>, brought them <WH935>.

Every one that did offer <WH7311> an offering <WH8641> of silver <WH3701> and brass <WH5178> brought <WH935> Jehovah <WH3068>'s offering <WH8641>; and every man <WH4672>, with whom was found acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086> for any work <WH4399> of the service <WH5656>, brought it <WH935>.

And all the women <WH802> that were <WH2450> wise-hearted <WH3820> did spin <WH2901> with their hands <WH3027>, and brought <WH935> that which they had spun <WH4299>, the blue <WH8504>, and the purple <WH713>, the scarlet <WH8144>, and the fine linen <WH8336>.
And all the women <WH802> whose heart <WH3820> stirred <WH5375> them up in wisdom <WH2451> spun <WH2901> the goats <WH5795>' hair.
And the rulers <WH5387> brought <WH935> the onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68>, and the stones <WH68> to be set <WH4394>, for the ephod <WH646>, and for the breastplate <WH2833>;
and the spice <WH1314>, and the oil <WH8081>; for the light <WH3974>, and for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and for the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>.

The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> brought <WH935> a freewill-offering <WH5071> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; every man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> made them willing <WH5068> to bring <WH935> for all the work <WH4399>, which Jehovah <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> to be made <WH6213> by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, See <WH7200>, Jehovah <WH3068> hath called <WH7121> by name <WH8034> Bezalel <WH1212> the son <WH1121> of Uri <WH221>, the son <WH1121> of Hur <WH2354>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah <WH3063>;
and he hath filled <WH4390> him with the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430>, in wisdom <WH2451>, in understanding <WH8394>, and in knowledge <WH1847>, and in all manner of workmanship <WH4399>;
and to devise <WH2803> skilful works <WH4284>, to work <WH6213> in gold <WH2091>, and in silver <WH3701>, and in brass <WH5178>,
and in cutting <WH2799> of stones <WH68> for setting <WH4390>, and in carving <WH2799> of wood <WH6086>, to work <WH6213> in all manner of skilful <WH4284> workmanship <WH4399>.
And he hath put <WH5414> in his heart <WH3820> that he may teach <WH3384>, both he <WH171>, and Oholiab, the son <WH1121> of Ahisamach <WH294>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>.

Them hath he filled <WH4390> with wisdom <WH2451> of heart <WH3820>, to work <WH6213> all manner of workmanship <WH4399>, of the engraver <WH2796>, and of the skilful workman <WH2803>, and of the embroiderer <WH7551>, in blue <WH8504>, and in purple <WH713>, in scarlet <WH8144>, and in fine linen <WH8336>, and of the weaver <WH707>, even of them that do <WH6213> any <WH3605> workmanship <WH4399>, and of those that devise <WH2803> skilful works <WH4284>.
